{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05073v1", "title": "The Drinfeld-Grinberg-Kazhdan theorem and embedding codimension of the
  arc space", "summary": "We prove an extension of the theorem of Drinfeld, Grinberg and Kazhdan to
arcs with arbitrary residue field. As an application we show that the embedding
codimension is generically constant on each irreducible subset of the arc space
which is not contained in the singular locus. In the case of maximal divisorial
sets, this relates the corresponding finite formal models with invariants of
singularities of the underlying variety.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-04-07T13:39:56Z"}
